data.title: How to Contest A Main Through Sands With FLASH/DRIVE
data.description: Here's a standard, but strong way to contest A Main with KAY/O. Your teammate playing deep A Main will be able to fight with you, as the flash does not blind them when peeking when thrown as shown in the video. There is no specific lineup with the flash, just pop and fight as Attackers will look in your direction as they hear the door open.
